Choose a Sample Shipping Box

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, FormArray, FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { Parcel } from '../../interfaces/parcel.interface'; import { Item } from '../../interfaces/item.interface'; import { ParcelDataService } from '../../services/parcel-data-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-packing-form', templateUrl: './packing-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./packing-form.component.css'] }) export class PackingFormComponent implements OnInit { public parcels: Parcel[] = []; public packingForm: FormGroup; public sampleParcelWeights: number[] = []; // Sample parcel weights fetched from the API public itemsByWeight: { [weight: number]: Item[] } = {}; // Items grouped by weight constructor( private parcelDataService: ParcelDataService, private formBuilder: FormBuilder ) { this.packingForm = this.formBuilder.group({ weightLimit: [''], items: this.formBuilder.array([]) }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchData(); } private fetchData(): void { this.parcelDataService.fetchParcels().subscribe( (parcels: Parcel[]) => { this.parcels = parcels; this.populateSampleParcelWeights(); this.populateItemsByWeight(); }, (error: any) => { console.error(error); } ); } private populateSampleParcelWeights(): void { this.sampleParcelWeights = this.parcels.map((parcel) => parcel.sampleParcelWeight); } private populateItemsByWeight(): void { for (const parcel of this.parcels) { const weight = parcel.sampleParcelWeight; if (!this.itemsByWeight[weight]) { this.itemsByWeight[weight] = parcel.items; } } } get items(): FormArray { return this.packingForm.get('items') as FormArray; } addItem(): void { const itemGroup = this.formBuilder.group({ index: [''], weight: [''], cost: [''] }); this.items.push(itemGroup); } removeItem(index: number): void { this.items.removeAt(index); } onWeightSelected(): void { const selectedWeight = this.packingForm.get('weightLimit')?.value; const selectedItems = this.itemsByWeight[selectedWeight] || []; this.items.controls.forEach((control) => { control.get('index')?.setValue(null); }); selectedItems.forEach((item, index) => { const control = this.items.at(index); control.get('index')?.setValue(item.index); control.get('weight')?.setValue(item.weight); control.get('cost')?.setValue(item.cost); }); } submitForm(): void { if (this.packingForm.valid) { const formValue = this.packingForm.value; console.log(formValue); } } }
